reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with one mentioning its corset-style top, and many saying it's perfect for prom. The dress fits well, particularly for formal events, and customers appreciate its comfort and value for money. The size receives mixed feedback, with some finding it true to size while others say it's a bit big. The tie length also gets mixed reviews, with one customer noting the lace-up back is very strong. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Blue Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress!! Fit perfect and more beautiful in person than the picture shows! Perfect prom dress at a reasonable price Read more
items.author: SabWash

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dress for the price!
items.body: This dress came quickly and the quality was as good as you would expect for a dress of the price, as the person the dress was bought for is shorter the dress was quite long but we made it work, the color, style and quality were great, worked great for the occasion and would definitely recommend buying it, if you are taller then 5’3 it will probably work better for you if not it will still work you may just need a bustle. Read more
items.author: Michael Vorce

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress! My daughter wore this for prom and felt like a princess. Quality dress for the price. My daughter struggles to find dresses she can fit into and this ended up being actually a bit larger than we expected. We were easily able to tighten it and bring it in though! Read more
items.author: Brandy Scott

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy from this seller
items.body: Item is a decent looking dress however runs big. Ordered size according to measurements and too large around waist for my daughter even when tightening it. So now I have to return it…no prepaid return label and the shipping is to China which costs more than the dress!!! They gave me a CA address to ship it to and told me I had to negotiate the amount of my return! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!! Read more
items.author: Partyof5

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prefect Prom Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress in person. True to size Read more
items.author: MBrown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Prom Dress Deal EVER!!
items.body: This dress was amazing ( my daughter bought the pale pink ) and fit my daughter perfect for prom!!! A lot of girls had similar styles for prom this year and this looked a lot more expensive than it was. When we were comparing and talking with other people we high-fived that we got such a good bargain with this dress!!! Comfortable and held up so well that we can even resell it - not one sequin fell off after wearing it all night. It fit as expected but we also liked that we could adjust the back lacing ribbon to give a little more breathing room. Very thick layers and well lined so we could wear any type of undergarments that we wanted to with it. I cannot say enough about this dress! Read more
items.author: Lucas H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.
items.body: Wow! This dress was perfect! It was so comfortable for what it was and it was pure white, exactly like I was hoping for. It ran a size small. I typically wear a four, but ordered a six instead and it fit nearly perfect. I did have to adjust the length a little. I am 5'3 and chopped around 3'' off the bottom. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks way more
items.body: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this dress!! My daughter found a $900 Sherri Hill dress she loved and so we looked here and found this one that is very similar. There are some alterations needed done on it bc it is rather long but nothing else actually needs to be done. Looking a super pretty not expensive gown for a kids dance this is perfect! My daughter is 5’6 128 lbs and she got a size small. Fits true to size forsure. Read more
items.author: Phillip Montoya

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Gold, Steel Blue, Burgundy, Hot Pink, Sage Green, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Dusty Rose, Red, Lilac, Silver, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
